content.rendered:
Last week I posted about my favorite soups and stews to keep you warm through the winter months. This week, I want to share my favorite beverages to sip on when it’s cold outside. During this time of year, I love flavoring my drinks with turmeric, ginger, cinnamon, and pumpkin. I encourage you to experiment with these anti-inflammatory spices and create delicious concoctions such as lattes, tonics, and smoothies. If you need inspiration, start here!

Golden Milk

Ginger Spice Smoothie

Non-Coffee Vanilla Latte

Cocoa-Bliss Smoothie

Spiced Pear Smoothie

Lion’s Mane Latte
